nodes.name: Search for Company Folder with Date

parameters.text:
=First find and Visit_website using the given compay name "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.companyName }}" and crawl through the website.  
1. Identify every person mentioned on the site who holds one of the following designations:
   • Founder
   • Co‑founder
   • CEO
2. Record each person’s name (if the name is shown) and the exact designation/role as it appears on the site. 

Then, using the information you gathered, write a concise summary(Key Points) about the company and what they provide (10‑15 lines).  
   • Use clear headings.  
   • Use bullet points where appropriate.  
   • The summary should cover the company’s mission, core activities, community focus, and any notable founders or leaders you discovered.  

Output the list of people with designations first, followed by the formatted company summary.

Output everything in appropriate markdown format.

Do Not output "People & Designations" Section if "not found".

=Research the company "{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.companyName }}" and provide:

1. Founder(s) name(s)
2. Current CEO name
3. A 10-15 line summary covering:
   - Company mission
   - Main activities and products/services
   - Key information about leadership

Format the response in markdown with clear sections. Be concise and factual.

main.node: Search for Company Folder with Date
